research_limitations.primary_limitation: Context7 does not contain macOS-specific system programming documentation
missing_domains: macOS security and entitlements for system modifications
research_limitations.mitigation_approach: Rely on existing pattern catalog and Swift community best practices

alternative_research_approach.pattern_catalog_utilization: Leverage existing security and system patterns from catalog
alternative_research_approach.swift_best_practices: Apply general Swift best practices for system programming
alternative_research_approach.security_frameworks: Use established security patterns for command execution
alternative_research_approach.testing_methodologies: Apply comprehensive testing patterns from previous implementations

research_impact_on_implementation.risk_mitigation: Increased emphasis on safety patterns and rollback mechanisms
research_impact_on_implementation.testing_strategy: Comprehensive testing to validate approaches without external validation
research_impact_on_implementation.documentation_approach: Document discovered patterns for future reference

future_research_areas: Request addition of Apple System Configuration documentation

research_quality_assessment.overall_research_value: Medium - eliminated false paths, confirmed pattern approach
